item.title: Using Leaflet Create Interactive Map
item.description: Introduction Recently, I have been using leaflet r package to create some interactive maps in R to help to build data stories. It’s pretty amazing that just few lines of code in r that could lead to a good looking interactive map! Let’s use tidytuesday pizza rating dataset to demonstrate the power of leaflet package. Loading Data library(tidyverse) library(leaflet) library(kableExtra) options(kableExtra.html.bsTable = TRUE) pizza_barstool <- readr::read_csv("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/rfordatascience/tidytuesday/master/data/2019/2019-10-01/pizza_barstool.csv") Take a look at the data.
